A Sad Christmas at Webify

December 26th, 2006 · No Comments

We recently had Marco Costa start in our group as a Project Release Manager, in order to help us better track and plan our future releases. He had worked in the AIX group for several years and wanted to try something new. Sadly, Marco passed away Saturday in a car crash. I didn’t really get to know him well in the two weeks he was on our team but he impressed me as a smart and charismatic fellow with a bright future. He will be missed.
